cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Earlier this month, Kentico held its annual Kentico MVP Summit. The goal of this event is to bring all of our MVPs to our headquarters in Brno, Czechia for 1 week, share our commercial strategy, product vision, collaborate in workshops, challenge assumptions, and build relationships.
cms.contentitemcommondata.ContentItemCommonDataVisualBuilderWidget:
{"editableAreas":[{"identifier":"main","sections":[{"identifier":"5384ccba-ec5b-4193-8004-09149520799c","type":"CommunityPortal.SingleColumnSection","properties":{"layout":"Standard","layoutParsed":0,"paddingTop":"Large","paddingTopParsed":0,"paddingBottom":"Large","paddingBottomParsed":0,"backgroundColor":"White","backgroundColorParsed":1},"zones":[{"identifier":"1649db90-30af-45e6-ad61-4161250ecfdb","widgets":[{"identifier":"5add3d08-c786-4475-b191-965769c967f5","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"c2ca6d5e-a0d0-453a-9e00-84fc4b9b6eb9","properties":{"markdown":"Earlier this month, Kentico held its annual Kentico MVP Summit. The goal of this event is to bring all of our MVPs to our headquarters in Brno, Czechia for 1 week, share our commercial strategy, product vision, collaborate in workshops, challenge assumptions, and build relationships.

It's a valuable event, both for us at Kentico and our MVPs. We're thrilled to see the impact it has, the inspiration kindles, and the action it drives.

There's much I could say about 2025's MVP Summit (it was the first I was responsible for organizing 😅) but instead I think I'll let the MVPs speak for themselves since they shared many insights, memories, and, of course, pictures over on LinkedIn.

cms.contentitemcommondata.WebPageMetaShortDescription: Earlier this month, Kentico held its annual Kentico MVP Summit. The goal of this event is to bring all of our MVPs to our headquarters in Brno, Czechia for 1 week, share our commercial strategy, product vision, collaborate in workshops, challenge assumptions, and build relationships.
